Name: Rosarita Margarita
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of salt rim (optional) & lime wedge on rim.
Review: This peachy coloured Margarita is well-balanced and flavoursome with zesty orange liqueur sitting well with cranberry.
History: Created in 1999 by Robert Plotkin and Raymon Flores of BarMedia, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Rosarita Margarita contains 202 calories
